document.topic_text: Home » News » Renault Kwid 1.0 launched at Rs. 3.82 lakhs Renault Kwid 1.0 launched at Rs. 3.82 lakhs By MotorDestination On August 22, 2016 In News No Comments Renault India has finally launched the powerful version of Kwid hatchback in the country. The car was first unveiled at the 2016 Auto Expo and was much hyped since then. Renault Kwid 1.0 price in India starts at Rs. 3.82 lakhs. The car will be available in two trims RxT and RxT (O) with the latter priced at Rs. 3.95 lakhs (ex-showroom, New Delhi) Looking at the price of Renault Kwid 1.0, the new version is just Rs. 22,000 expensive than the regular 800cc model. For that little price, the customer would get much peppier 999cc three cylinder SCe motor that produces 68PS and 91Nm of peak torque. Currently, the 5-speed manual will be available with the engine while soon there will be Renault Kwid 1.0-litre AMT on offer as well. At this price point, Renault Kwid 1.0-litre model has best in class power to weight ratio of 97PS/tonne. As far as fuel economy of Kwid 1.0-litre is concerned, it is best in category as well delivering 23.1kmpl (ARAI) In terms of aesthetics, the powerful version can be differentiated by the chequered side body graphics engraved with ‘1.0’ and glossy grey finishing on ORVMs. As it will be offered in the top end slot, the car will be available with features like 7-inch MEDIANAV touchscreen infotainment unit, optional driver side airbag, fabric upholstery with red stitching, front power windows and remote central locking. Renault Kwid 1.0 version will compete against Maruti Alto K10 1.0 and Hyundai Eon 1.0 in the segment. You might also be interested in
